sentences.english: The indication for tympanoplasty has become broad.

sentences.english: Objective In order to investigate the relation of curative effect with tympanostomy tubes.

sentences.english: To explore the clinical meaning of "C" tympanum figure in secretory otitis media.

sentences.english: Objective To provide anatomical data of cervical tympanic nerves for the resection of tympanic nerves.

sentences.english: Purpose To study the multi view CT technique for tympanum examination.

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the relative factors affecting auditory effects after tympanoplasty.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of tympanic administration through eustachian tube in treating middle ear adhesion.

definition: Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
internal auditory meatus (canal in temporal bone of skull housing auditory nerves)
external auditory meatus/auditory canal, between the outer ear 外耳 and tympanum 鼓膜
chain of ossicles (in the middle ear)
ossicles (of the middle ear)/three ossicles, acting as levers to amplify sound, namely: stapes or stirrup bone 鐙骨|镫骨, incus or anvil bone 砧骨, malleus or hammer bone 錘骨|锤骨
stapes or stirrup bone of middle ear, passing sound vibration to the inner ear
